Name: Guardian Shadow
Desc: A shadow manifested by the power of a Stellaron, carrying out the Fragmentum's unceasing will to expand.\nA living being of energy born from the projection of the desires of sentient lifeforms into the Fragmentum, akin to a pearl created from a single grain of sand. This energy wanders around aimlessly, acting only when executing the will of its master.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.
Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.
Your team is imposed with a ban on attacking the Guardian Shadow. Should anyone do so, they immediately receive 1 attack.
Your team is imposed with a ban on using Basic ATK. Should anyone do so, they immediately receive 1 attack.
Your team is imposed with a ban on using Skill. Should anyone do so, they immediately receive 1 attack.
Deals successive minor Lightning DMG to a random target, with a chance to inflict Shock.
Deals Lightning DMG to whoever violates the ban.
Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.
Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.
